code: /** @jsxRuntime classic */ /** @jsx jsx */import{useState}from"react";import{jsx,Styled}from"theme-ui";import theme from"./fonts.js";export default function Button(props){return jsx(Styled.a,{sx:{textDecoration:"none",cursor:"pointer",mr:3,mt:3,backgroundColor:props.backgroundColorBtn,pt:3,pb:3,pr:4,pl:4,borderRadius:16,"@keyframes fadeInDiv":{from:{backgroundColor:props.backgroundColorBtn},to:{backgroundColor:props.secondaryBackground}},animationDuration:"0.7s","&:hover":{backgroundColor:props.textColorBtn},"&:hover h5":{color:props.backgroundColorBtn}},href:props.link,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer"},jsx(Styled.div,null,jsx(Styled.h5,{sx:{fontSize:[2,3,4],fontWeight:"bold",color:props.textColorBtn,fontFamily:'system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif'}},props.data)));}
